# Project Description
This project is a web application built with Angular Framework.

## Project Structure
- `src/`: Contains the main application code
- `components/`: Angular components
- `services/`: Services that can fetch things from APIs
- `utils/`: Utility functions

## Coding Standards
- Check [copilot-context.md](copilot-context.md) for coding standards
- Use async/await instead of Promises
- Typescript is the main language
- Add comments with Angular Concepts when building components
- Dependencies should point downwards
- Template based Angular Forms is the Default

## Key Technologies
- Angular Framework
- Node.js
- TypeScript
